description: Aster frikartii 'Jungfrau' is a truly amazing plant species that bears beautiful star-shaped flowers in shades of lavender blue. Its elegant foliage is evergreen and grows in a unique and attractive mounding form. This variety can also produce flowers throughout the summer and autumn months. Its low-maintenance nature makes it a great choice for novice gardeners. It is resistant to pests and disease and flourishes in sun or partial shade. This stunning variety of aster is the perfect addition to any garden and sure to bring lasting joy.
